method: **Quest & Thieves Guild:** Do *Biohazard*, *Plague City*, *Tower of Life* early if you can. Get to 15 for HAM members.
tips: Ironmen need money, so early pickpocketing is good GP. Pickpocket *Men/Women* in Lumbridge for early cash.

method: **Pickpocketing HAM Members:** Easy to get clue scrolls and HAM robes/buttons for quests.
tips: Keep the buttons for later quests.

method: **Safecracking:** Just like mains, this is the XP meta. Safes drop huge singular XP drops + pilfer points.
tips: Unlock the **Loot Bag** upgrades first to hold more loot.
Use the **Five-finger discount** aura if you have loyalty points.

method: **Prifddinas Elves:** Essential for diverse supplies (Potions, Runes, Seeds).
tips: Rotate clans efficiently. Provides Crystal Keys too.
